ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectLiard First Nation and Ross River Dena Council Remission Order
PrecisOrder remitting (1) to LIARD FIRST NATION, the amount of $14,897,877.24, representing the principal and interest amounts with respect to its previously-written-off support loans for comprehensive land claim negotiations; and (2) to ROSS RIVER DENA COUNCIL, the amount of $10,740,817.63, representing the principal and interest amounts with respect to its previously-written-off support loans for comprehensive land claim negotiations.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2020-0015 Publication Date: 2020-02-19
AttachmentsAttachment
